general_advisory: Harvest rice crops at maturity stage, practice proper pest and disease surveillance, apply micronutrient spray for crops showing deficiency. Use appropriate pesticides for pest control, and manage diseases in fishponds during winters. Utilize OUAT KALINGA products for better agricultural benefits.

advisory: Post-harvest drying of paddy grains is essential for consumption and seed purposes.
Grow short duration Rabi crops like green gram, black gram, cowpea, etc., in lowlands utilizing soil moisture.
Grow high yielding varieties like T 9, PU 11, PU 19, and PU 30 for black gram.
Use 10 kg seeds/acre and treat seeds with Rhizobium culture before sowing.
Select suitable groundnut varieties for Odisha like Kalinga groundnut 101, Devi, etc.
Adequate quantity of seed kernels is essential for planting.
